subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The floors of cupola charging platforms must be—

ol.li: of heavy timber or non-slip steel plate; and

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: All parts of the cupola charging platform must be covered by a roof not less than 3 m above the platform.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: A cupola charging platform must have—

ol.li: a wall, not less than 1 m high, measured from the floor of the platform, constructed to surround the platform; and
the side between the top of the wall and the roof suitably waterproofed an ventilated.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: A properly constructed access stair or ramp must be provide to give access to every cupola charging platform and must comply with AS 1657.
